Magoosh's Number Sense

Using each of the four digits at the top once, construct an expression that evaluates to an integer between 1 and 20 via any combination of the following operators:

  • addition +
  • subtraction -
  • multiplication *
  • division /
  • parentheses ()
  • Note: operators can be repeated. Ex: 1 + 2 + 3 + 4

Example: Given the digits 1 2 3 4, one possible expression that evaluates to 9 is: 4 * (2 + 1) - 3.

Click on any bar or integer on the Solutions chart to see a list of solutions for that integer.
